Detailed Description

Encapsulates a twisting legacy binding.

DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis  axis 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Parameters:
driver The bone that drives this joint parameter
axis The axis that this parameter is applied on

DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis  axis,
float  start,
float  end 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Parameters:
driver The bone that drives this joint parameter
axis The axis that this parameter is applied on
start The point on the axis where the twist blend zone starts
end The point on the axis where the twist blend zone ends
DzLegacyTwistParam::~DzLegacyTwistParam (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzLegacyTwistParam::DzLegacyTwistParam ( const DzInFile *  file  ) 

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

void DzLegacyTwistParam::setApplyBlend ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether or not the blend zone is applied for this joint

Parameters:
onOff If true, the blend zone for the parameter will be used to calculate weights, otherwise the blend zone is ignored.

bool DzLegacyTwistParam::applyBlend [read, write]
